## Scope of Requirement: 
The Summerland Research and Development Centre of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada seeks a portable minirhizotron system with high-resolution imaging capabilities. The equipment will be used to study fruit tree root systems in situ and support research activities in pomology and plant stress physiology.
